name: John Doe

summary.text: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expert in modern JavaScript ecosystems (React, Node.js) and cloud-native architectures. Proven ability to lead teams, design RESTful APIs, and optimize frontend performance.

DevOps & Site Reliability Engineer passionate about automation and infrastructure as code. Specialized in Kubernetes, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines. Experienced in scaling high-traffic systems and ensuring 99.99% availability through robust monitoring and security practices.

skills.text:
Languages: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Python, Go, Bash
Frontend: React, Next.js, Redux, Tailwind CSS, HTML5/CSS3
Backend: Node.js, Express.js, Django, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Prometheus

Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
Frontend: React, Vue.js, Next.js, Webpack, Babel, Sass, Jest, Cypress
UI/UX: Figma, Material-UI, Styled-Components, Accessibility (WCAG)

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.intro: Lead developer for the company's flagship e-commerce product, managing a team of 5 engineers.

bullets.text: Architected and built a microservices-based e-commerce platform using Node.js and Go, handling 10k+ concurrent users.
Led the migration of the legacy monolithic frontend to a modern Next.js application, improving Core Web Vitals by 40%.
Implemented a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and ArgoCD, reducing deployment time from 1 hour to 5 minutes.
Designed and deployed a serverless data processing pipeline on AWS Lambda to handle real-time analytics.
Developed responsive, interactive user interfaces using React and Redux, ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
Built and maintained RESTful APIs using Python (Django) and integrated with PostgreSQL databases.
Containerized application services using Docker and orchestrated deployments on an on-premise Kubernetes cluster.
Collaborated with designers to implement pixel-perfect landing pages using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Assisted in backend development tasks using PHP (Laravel) and MySQL for client CMS projects.
Automated server provisioning and configuration management using Ansible scripts.

education: B.Sc. in Computer Science, University of Technology · 2013–2017
